title: 5 best foods that are effective in relieving COVID vaccine side effects | The Times of India
description: In order to get back to your routine immediately after the vaccination, all you need to do is add some of these vital and nutritious ingredients to your meals.
cleaned_text: that are effective in relieving COVID vaccine side effects Covid vaccine has brought with it some not so severe side effects such as arm soreness, headache, fever, body ache, weakness, and fatigue that generally lasts for 2-3 days maximum. In order to get back to your routine immediately after the vaccination, all you need to do is add some of these vital and nutritious ingredients to your meals. These ingredients would help you combat fatigue or aches due to the vaccine. Here are 5 best foods that are effective in relieving covid vaccine side effects. [readmore](javascript://) 02/6Turmeric Turmeric is simply a must have spice for the Indian cuisines. With surplus anti-bacterial, anti-viral, anti-inflammatory, analgesic and anti-fungal properties, turmeric significantly promotes the immune system. Curcuminoids (mostly curcumin) and essential oils (primarily monoterpenes) are the major bioactive constituents of turmeric and act as the therapeutic agent for the body's health. [readmore](javascript://) 03/6Ginger Ginger is an eminent spice that will not only spice up your bland food but will add several medicinal properties to it. Fully packed with amino acids and vital enzymes, ginger impressively reduces inflammation while soothing your mind and relieving your stress. You can even combine this ingredient with your evening tea inorder to feel relaxed and easy. [readmore](javascript://) 04/6Green leafy vegetables Leaf vegetables consist of surplus dietary fiber, vitamin C, provitamin A carotenoids, folate, manganese and most importantly the antagonist vitamin K. These health problems nutrients would help you to keep up with your metabolism and let you feel less fatigued. This is the best supplement to accelerate post vaccination health. [readmore](javascript://) 05/6Water- rich foods Opt for food options which are rich in its water content. If you will be thoroughly hydrated post vaccination, it will help you to maintain the ambient body temperature and mental condition as well. Gaining a lot of nutrition through the watery foods will keep you refreshed and calmed. Try including oranges, melons, cucumbers and peaches in your post vaccination diet. [readmore](javascript://) 06/6Multi grains It is always way more important to maintain your gut health and digestive system all the time. Better digestion and the gut will automatically result in better health. In order to boost your energy levels, you need to include multi grains to your diet. Fibre rich content of this food will allow the better absorption of nutrition in your gut and conversion of energy.
